data.text:
I like this hotel very much because in this hotel I felt as I'm at home with my family , Mr. Cemal and Mr. Nedim both are very generous people they treat the guest as a friend or more, I stayed in Ramadan for three nights they used to wake me up for suhur, Mr. Nedim cooked very nice iftar for me and all the fasting guests, I just felt the smell of the house in this hotel the cleanliness, the treatment all can make you come back again and again, for sure I well be back again whenever I can.
My regards to you merkez hotel, Mr. Nedim and Mr. Cemal you are my family in Izmir 
I wish you all the best
data.title: My  second home in zmir

data.text: Merkez Oteli is a new hotel in Izmir with very well designed bedrooms, which have character, elegance and cosiness. It is situated between two supermarkets. Basmane Gar/Train Station and Basmane Corapakki Camii/Mosque are within walking distance. Cemal (Manager) and Nedim are pleasant and helpful. Wifi is available throughout the Hotel and it is cleaned on a daily basis. Breakfast is only basic and there is no lift access. Highly recommended for it's ambience and reasonable price!
data.title: A Charming & Economical  Hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Thank you very much sir.for your good wishes
owner_response.author: Cemal G
